 Ref: FA/KH

To Whom It May Concern


Dear Sir/Madam


The patient using this application has an Endocrine condition, and requires a number of items to be available at all times.

 These items therefore need to be taken as carry-on luggage, and may include the following:
 - Needles and syringes
 - Medication- oral and/or injectable
 - Blood sugar monitors
 - Blood sugar testing strips
 - Feeding pump/feed sets


If you require any further information please contact us on the above number.


Yours faithfully


Endocrine Service
 Royal Hospital for Sick Children, Glasgow,

 Prof SF Ahmed
 Dr M G Shaikh
 Dr A Mason
 Dr J Wong
